channel.title: SCAR Help File
channel.description:
[b][size=14pt]SCAR Help File[/size][/b]
Let me present.... SCAR Help File! :P
SCAR Help File is a Help File (HTML Help - .CHM), which is full of Tutorials, Guides, FAQs and Abouts.. It's a really good way for people to learn SCAR scripting (and SCAR using, too). It's FAST (for using) and BIG (not really big in size, though.. :D).
[b]NOTE:[/b] I take NO credits about this. This is [u]ONLY[/u] compiled together by me. I have collected all these helpful Tutorials, FAQs, Abouts, Guides soon 3 years (started collecting June 2004) (from communities like: ReiNet, RSCheatNet, Kaitnieks, RuneCMS, Sythe, Saradomin, RS2Cheating, RS-Resources, Moparisthebest, Cruels, SCAR-Scripts, SCARForum, SRL Forums, JAGHaX, Fagex and the list just goes on) and they are all made by very kind/helpful people - SCAR supporters. So, thanks to them!
..now I just have put em all together. In one single file.
[u]Links are here:[/u]
[b]NEW Version[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/32695280/SCAR_Help_File.zip.html - RapidShare http://www.megaupload.com/fi/?d=AHZ8MNO3 - MEGAUPLOAD
[b]OLD Versions[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/28323130/SCAR_Help_File.zip.html - RapidShare http://www.megaupload.com/?d=EWKQHK6E - MEGAUPLOAD
[b]OLDEST Version[/b] http://rapidshare.com/files/13157559/SCAR_Help_File.zip.html - RapidShare http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JXT0BUPO - MEGAUPLOAD
Check it out people, it took me about month to put documents together (I added almost everyday about hour or two stuff in it).
If you can't open it, then you don't have HTML Help Workshop installed (in Windows XP it should be installed by default), you can download it from [url=http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/en-us/htmlhelp/html/hwMicrosoftHTMLHelpDownloads.asp]HERE[/url]. Download it and install. (I included HTML Help Workshop to the NEW Version zip)
I attached Credits document, please take a look at it too...
----------------------------------- P.S. Remember to report problems, if you just "meet" any. -----------------------------------
Known problem: When you copy code(s) from code box('s), it will be spaced when you paste it to SCAR or anywhere else. It's really annoying, but I haven't figured yet how to solve it... But erm, to be honest, if you just look at the codes and write most of the stuff yourself (which means: don't just copy and paste every example) from em, the [b]more[/b] and [b]faster[/b] you'll learn. ;)
This problem is not anykind of harmful problem - there is no harmful problems with Help File. It's just ANNOYING one.
Here is example:
This is what the code would look like in code box [code]begin WriteLn('Test'); end.[/code]
Now when you copy and paste it, it will look like this in SCAR [code]begin
WriteLn('Test');
end.
[/code]
----------------------------------- -----------------------------------
Critic and comments are welcome. :)
Enjoy people,
Janilabo

item.title: SCAR Help File
item.dc:creator: @Janilabo Janilabo
item.description:
@Janilabo wrote:

[size=14pt]SCAR Help File[/size]

Let me present… SCAR Help File!

SCAR Help File is a Help File (HTML Help - .CHM), which is full of Tutorials, Guides, FAQs and Abouts… It’s a really good way for people to learn SCAR scripting (and SCAR using, too). It’s FAST (for using) and BIG (not really big in size, though… :D).

NOTE: I take NO credits about this. This is ONLY compiled together by me. I have collected all these helpful Tutorials, FAQs, Abouts, Guides soon 3 years (started collecting June 2004) (from communities like: ReiNet, RSCheatNet, Kaitnieks, RuneCMS, Sythe, Saradomin, RS2Cheating, RS-Resources, Moparisthebest, Cruels, SCAR-Scripts, SCARForum, SRL Forums, JAGHaX, Fagex and the list just goes on) and they are all made by very kind/helpful people - SCAR supporters. So, thanks to them!

…now I just have put em all together. In one single file.

Links are here:

NEW Version
http://rapidshare.com/files/32695280/SCAR_Help_File.zip.html - RapidShare
http://www.megaupload.com/fi/?d=AHZ8MNO3 - MEGAUPLOAD

OLD Versions
http://rapidshare.com/files/28323130/SCAR_Help_File.zip.html - RapidShare
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=EWKQHK6E - MEGAUPLOAD

OLDEST Version
http://rapidshare.com/files/13157559/SCAR_Help_File.zip.html - RapidShare
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=JXT0BUPO - MEGAUPLOAD

Check it out people, it took me about month to put documents together (I added almost everyday about hour or two stuff in it).

If you can’t open it, then you don’t have HTML Help Workshop installed (in Windows XP it should be installed by default), you can download it from HERE. Download it and install. (I included HTML Help Workshop to the NEW Version zip)

I attached Credits document, please take a look at it too…

P.S. Remember to report problems, if you just “meet” any.

Known problem:
When you copy code(s) from code box('s), it will be spaced when you paste it to SCAR or anywhere else. It’s really annoying, but I haven’t figured yet how to solve it…
But erm, to be honest, if you just look at the codes and write most of the stuff yourself (which means: don’t just copy and paste every example) from em, the more and faster you’ll learn.

This problem is not anykind of harmful problem - there is no harmful problems with Help File. It’s just ANNOYING one.

Here is example:

This is what the code would look like in code box

begin WriteLn('Test'); end.

Now when you copy and paste it, it will look like this in SCAR

[code]begin

WriteLn(‘Test’);

end.

[/code]

Critic and comments are welcome.

Enjoy people,

Janilabo
